thread.title: U.S. Shale Juggernaut Contends With a New Obstacle—Energy Journal

author: Neanda Salvaterra
title: U.S. Shale Juggernaut Contends With a New Obstacle—Energy Journal
text: A daily digest of The Wall Street Journal’s coverage of energy companies, commodity markets and the forces that shape them.
